name: highDEAS: Metro
description: Cleans up the HighDeas.com website, inverts the color scheme, and makes it more like the Windows Phone 7 Metro style.
additional_info:
Install Instructions

1. Click Stylish Button
2. Edit highDEAS: Metro
3. Near bottom, click add section
4. enter "highdeas.com", set to all on domain
5. Save
